markdownRemark.html:
No matter if you work with JavaScript at client or server side, at some point you'll need to work with urls and its query params.

There are great libraries for this purpose -like query-string or qs- but the question is: why add some kb of size of your page when there is a native solution?

sdf sdf sdf sdf sd
